query: market strategy fir aaya buseness model
response:
Market strategy aur business model dono business ke liye bahut zaroori hote hain. 

**Market Strategy**: Yeh batata hai ki aap apne products ya services ko customers tak kaise pahunchayenge. Isme advertising, pricing, aur competition ka analysis shamil hota hai.

**Business Model**: Yeh batata hai ki aapka business kaise paisa kamaata hai. Isme aapki services, customers, aur revenue ka source shamil hota hai.

Dono milkar aapke business ko successful banate hain!
